input_text:
Job Title: Auto Technicians - Ken Ganley Ford Parma/Norton

Location: Norton, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Ken Ganley Ford Norton

2835 Barber Rd., Norton, OH 44203

AUTOMOTIVE TECHNICIAN

Our Techs Earn $65,000 - $150,000+ Annually!

Flexible Schedule, LOTS of Work & Great Benefits! State-of-the-Art Facility & Equipment!

Experience is required. Diesel experience is a plus!

Ken Ganley Ford Norton is growing and HIRING NOW for skilled Service Technicians to perform vehicle repairs and routine service/maintenance to our customers’ vehicles.

Whether you are a Service Tech, Diesel Tech, ASE Certified, Any Brand Certified, or Master Certified Technician – We want to hear from you!

Ken Ganley Auto Group is proud to be Ohio’s largest dealer group and now ranks #14 in the country overall. Join our world-class team and be a part of one of the fastest-growing dealership groups in Ohio and beyond where we value professionalism, integrity, and excellence in everything we do. We offer continuous paid training and a best-in-class compensation and benefits package, including top pay and benefits in our area. Apply online today!

We offer:

Top pay in the area! Tell us about your experience at your interview!Performance bonuses! Our techs can earn $65,000 - $150,000+ a year!Retention bonusesReferral ProgramYou’ll never be short on work!Specialty tools providedProfessional tool relocation assistanceContinued training & certification programASE reimbursementFlexible ScheduleSign-on bonus for the right candidates!Video or phone interviewing to accommodate out-of-town applicantsFull Family Benefits – Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance401(k) Retirement Plan with Company MatchGenerous paid vacation, holidays & sick timeEmployee discounts on products & services & vehicle purchase plansHeated, state-of-art facilityShop LunchesKnowledgeable Service Advisors & a well-equipped, fully stocked Parts DepartmentStable work with growth and advancement opportunities


Responsibilities - Service Technician:

Inspect vehicle and diagnose the problem(s)Perform quality repair/maintenance work that meets dealership and manufacturer standards including engine, transmission, electrical, steering, suspension, braking, air conditioning, etc. Provide an estimate of time and parts needed for repair/maintenanceLearn new technical information and techniques in training sessions to stay current with rapidly changing technologyKeep shop neat and account for dealership-owned toolsOther duties may be assigned according to skill level and certification


Qualifications - Service Technician:

2+ years of experience as an auto technician is requiredDiesel experience is highly desired!Factory Certified & ASE Certified is a huge plus!We welcome Technicians from ALL brands!Valid driver's license with an acceptable driving recordFlexible and focused on maintaining a high level of customer serviceGood work ethic and problem-solving skillsA positive attitude and works well as part of a teamPlease upload your resume. Completing the online assessment will grant you priority considerationMust be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship and be a current residentApplicants must pass pre-employment screening


We are an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.summary: Joining our world-class team at Ken Ganley Ford Norton, a leading dealership group in Ohio.

job_responsibilities: Learn new technical information and techniques
Other duties according to skill level and certification
benefits: Sign-on bonus for the right candidates
Generous paid vacation, holidays & sick time
Stable work with growth and advancement opportunities
